name: Campaign Stuffs Map
description:
this project will hopefully be a straight-arrow once i figure out some things, its initial goals will be to include the Campaign Units/Upgrades/Abiities and Structures to both Terran and Zerg spanning SC2 Wings of Liberty and Heart of the Swarm.

eventually when we have access to its data, i plan to include the same things for Legacy of the Void but that may be some time yet

until then it will only specialize in Terran and Zerg, however i will still make Protoss playable even if its less-enticing..for those who really want to play Protoss even if they cant have all the fancy things for now like i would give to Terran and Zerg, but that will change once we get Legacy of the Void, but whether that is a year away or even 2, who knows

while the project will be playable and up for showcase as soon as i finish all the changes for Terran and Zerg, i will not consider it truly Finished until Protoss can receive the same treatment via Legacy of the Void releasing, but i think its best to let the people who want to play it do so as soon as i finish the changes i can achieve now, rather than keep them waiting until the Protoss Expansion
author: _ForgeUser12800721
